DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study collect information brain function structure among active duty military personnel civilians healthy . Researchers want develop database normal volunteer use comparison similar database active duty military post-concussive syndrome ( PCS ) mild traumatic brain injury . Findings study may use design large study evaluate whether hyperbaric oxygen treatment actually improve PCS . Participants study undergo numerous test assess physical , mental , intellectual health might change time . Participants wear heart activity monitor , undergo brain imaging , provide blood urine laboratory testing , vision , hearing , balance , muscle function test . They also complete number questionnaire interview . This battery test repeat twice course 6 month .
DOC.brief_title: Normative Datasets Assessments Planned Mild Traumatic Brain Injury ( NORMAL )
DOC.detailed_description: The primary purpose study develop database normal healthy participant outcome use program study hyperbaric oxygen ( HBO2 ) vs. sham control participant persistent post-concussive symptom . This study characterize distribution response change response time outcomes examine association measure within give normal participant across participant characteristic age gender . It evaluate test-retest reliability series assessment anticipate use primary , secondary , exploratory outcome program study . A secondary purpose study compare normative value result randomize exploratory study HBO2 vs. sham control participant persistent post-concussive symptom . Also , investigator examine relationship outcome measure normal participant ( respect clinical equivalence , participant burden , risk ) compare association observe study . In study , normal , healthy , non-brain injured civilian military participant ( active inactive ) undergo battery outcome assessment define test interval replicate assessment battery use program study investigate safety HBO2 patient post-concussive symptom follow mild traumatic brain injury ( TBI ) . The planned comprehensive assessment obtain robust neuropsychological , physiological , neuroimaging data . Other evaluation include laboratory testing evaluation auditory , vestibular , visual system . Neuroimaging ( magnetic resonance imaging compute tomography angiography ) assess participant baseline 6 month . Neurological function electroencephalography ( EEG ) assess baseline . All in-person outcome measure assess participant baseline , 13 week , 6 month .
DOC.criteria: Active duty civilian Colorado Springs area . Men 1865 year old woman 1835 year old time enrollment . Able speak read English , primary language . Agrees , appear able participate outcome assessment . Agrees provide blood sample laboratory test specimen bank . Demonstrates ability offer informed consent sign study inform consent document . No known brain imaging abnormality . Known history full term noncomplicated birth . Estimated glomerular filtration rate ( eGFR ) > 90 . Prisoners . Pregnant Women . Minors . Civilian participant plan leave conflict study visit relocation within 6 month study enrollment , unwilling unable return follow . Active duty participant plan leave deployment conflict assessment interval . Any lifetime history brain injury . Diagnosis , persistent history , symptoms neurological disorder ( e.g. , tinnitus , vertigo , chronic fatigue , numbness , tingle , chronic migraine , fibromyalgia , multiple sclerosis ) . Active therapy affective disorder , behavioral disorder , psychological disorder . Diagnosis diabetes mellitus Current complaint brain injury symptom cognitive affective problem . Diagnosis recurrent migraine cluster headaches medical management . Headaches occur two time per week . Recurrent dizziness require medical management . Dizziness two time per week . History theater war zone activity place participant within combat zone environment . Diagnosis PTSD subclinical posttraumatic symptom . Known neuroimaging abnormality . Use daily prescription drug could impact normal outcome ( e.g. , beta blocker , antidepressant ) , follow exception : Participants 45 year old may take statin ACE inhibitor . Oral injectable contraceptive permit Participants < 45 year old take daily prescription ( exception oral injectable contraceptive ) Known atrial septal defect . History hydrocephalus/microcephaly/macrocephaly . History developmental delay learn disorder child . Women breastfeed . Women childbearing potential agree practice acceptable form birth control study period . Allergy iodinebased contrast dye ( exclusion criterion neuroimaging assessment measure ) . Those unable participate fully outcome assessment unless enrollment review approve ( write ) Study Director . Binocular vision correctable 20/50 . Deafness ear define 90 decibel hearing loss great speech frequency . Anxiety claustrophobia preclude participation neuroimaging vestibular procedure . History therapeutic ionizing radiation head . Foreign material head would interfere brain imaging . Foreign material within individual pose risk MRI . History illicit drug use , except remote , nonhabitual use marijuana . History last year , alcohol abuse . Current positive urine test illicit substance ( ) . Active prior malignancy except basal cell carcinoma within last 5 year . Unable abstain caffeine tobacco product least 2hour interval . Concurrent enrollment research trial .
